pull.title: Remove obsolete reference to CValidationState from UpdateCoins.
pull.body: I prefer, but do not insist on this. Might want to refactor the remaining dummy CTxUndo txundo; at some other time.

events.message: Remove obsolete reference to CValidationState from UpdateCoins.

issue.title: Overwinter SignatureHash
issue.body:
Implements ZIP 143.

Includes code cherry-picked from the following upstream PRs:

- bitcoin/bitcoin#7276
- bitcoin/bitcoin#7976
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8118
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8149
  - Only amount validation and SignatureHash commits.
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8346
- bitcoin/bitcoin#8524

Part of #2074 and #2254. Closes #1408 and #2584.

labels.name: C-upstream-port
labels.description: Category: Changes that are ported from the Bitcoin Core codebase.

labels.name: M-requires-nu
labels.description: A network upgrade is required to implement this.

labels.name: D-bitcoin-divergence
labels.description: Design issue: Divergence from Bitcoin (upstream code and/or architecture).

labels.name: M-potential-loss-of-funds
labels.description: This issue risks a potential loss of funds for a user.

milestone.title: v1.0.15
milestone.description: The Overwinter consensus logic, and a testnet activation height.

issue.title: Precompute sighashes
issue.body:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6061 - Separate Consensus::CheckTxInputs and GetSpendHeight in CheckInputs
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7276 - Report non-mandatory script failures correctly
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7976 - Remove obsolete reference to CValidationState from UpdateCoins
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8346 - Mempool: Use Consensus::CheckTxInputs direclty over main::CheckInputs
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8524 - Precompute sighashes
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8651 - Predeclare PrecomputedTransactionData as struct

On top of #365, #358

issue.title: Base work for the Sapling signatureHash
issue.body:
Base work for the new transaction digest algorithm for signature verification on PIVX Sapling transactions.

Essentially, an implementation of BIP143 + few more good commits that found down the rabbit hole.

Back ports:

* bitcoin#7276 
* bitcoin#7976
* bitcoin#8118
* bitcoin#8149 (only amount validation and SignatureHash commits).
* bitcoin#6088 (only the dummy signature one - will be removed once #1663 get merged -).
* bitcoin#6379
* bitcoin#8524

Next step over this area (need 1553 merged to be able to push it) is the further specialization of BIP143 into our custom implementation of ZIP143 (with a different digest algorithm definition using our tx data and hash personalization).

comments.body:
nit: If you do trivial fixes, please also do all other trivial fixes in the same line:

``` diff
diff --git a/src/main.cpp b/src/main.cpp
index c5d2e23..7d5beab 100644
--- a/src/main.cpp
+++ b/src/main.cpp
@@ -1747 +1747 @@ void static InvalidBlockFound(CBlockIndex *pindex, const CValidationState &state

+void UpdateCoins(const CTransaction& tx, CCoinsViewCache& inputs, CTxUndo& txundo, int nHeight)
@@ -1773 +1773 @@ void UpdateCoins(const CTransaction& tx, CCoinsViewCache &inputs, CTxUndo &txund
-void UpdateCoins(const CTransaction& tx, CCoinsViewCache &inputs, int nHeight)
+void UpdateCoins(const CTransaction& tx, CCoinsViewCache& inputs, int nHeight)
diff --git a/src/main.h b/src/main.h
index 716378e..792747a 100644
--- a/src/main.h
+++ b/src/main.h
@@ -362 +362 @@ bool CheckInputs(const CTransaction& tx, CValidationState &state, const CCoinsVi
-void UpdateCoins(const CTransaction& tx, CCoinsViewCache &inputs, int nHeight);
+void UpdateCoins(const CTransaction& tx, CCoinsViewCache& inputs, int nHeight);
```
